transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan sir, aap trading mein baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Sir actually aaj aapko online aana tha na to isi vajah se hum wait kar rahe hain.
Customer: Madam aaj to hamara chutti hai madam.
Executive: Nahi but aapne aaj ka time diya tha sir.
Customer: Aaj ka time kise diya tha? Kal hi to baat hua tha.
Executive: Haan to Shivam ji se aapne bola hoga na ki aaj aap online aana hai.
Customer: Nahi baat hi kal baat hi nahi kiya na kal chutti hai kal baat karenge sir.
Executive: Sir aapne aaj ke vakt diya tha isiliye humne call kiya hai. Chutti category to nahi ban pa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Wo to category nahi ban payegi to kuch matlab nahi hai hamara fir wo to yaar.
Executive: Wahi cheez hai sir aur bhi best possible jo bhi buylead cater kaise karna hai search kaise karna hai wo hum discuss kar rahe the.
Customer: Ek kaam kar ek ek kaam karo madam kal phone karna.
Executive: Sir aaj hi baat honi thi na sir. Aaj kar bhi lete.
Customer: Meri baat suno aaj chutti hai hamara company factory band hai aaj.
Executive: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states today is a holiday.

- Category is not being created.



Resolution:

- Executive called as customer gave time for today.

- Executive wanted to discuss buylead catering and search.



Next Steps: 

- Customer asked the executive to call tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- holiday, category, buyleads
